alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Garrard and southern Madison Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boone, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Madison and east central Garrard Counties, including the following locations... Silver Creek, Caleast, Duluth, Peytontown, Paint Lick, Bighill, Kingston, Whites, Buggytown and Duncanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
